mapper.insert: insert into bh_book_share(book_name, company, writer, descript, user_name, file, rdate, wdate, status) values( #{bookName}, #{company}, #{writer}, #{descript}, #{userName}, #{file}, now(), now(), "대출 가능" );
mapper.select: select * from bh_book_borrow where bookNo = #{bookNo} and userName = #{userName};
mapper.update: update bh_book_share set status = #{status}, wdate = null where id = #{id};
mapper.delete: delete from bh_book_share_borrow where userName = #{userName} and bookNo = #{bookNo};
